text: Green and Gray is the seventh studio album by American indie rock band Pile. It was released on May 3, 2019 through Exploding in Sound. ==Critical reception== Green and Gray was met with generally favorable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 78, based on 5 reviews. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart !
